text: (maraṇayaṭa pat vū) ovun (sohon valin) piṭamaṁ vī (tama deviyan) idiriyaṭa pæmiṇa siṭa gannā dinadī, ovungē kisima kāraṇāvak allāhṭa san̆gavā tabannaṭa næta. “rājyaya ada kā haṭa nam ayitida?”yi (vimasanu læba, eyaṭa piḷituru vaśayen “siyallanvama) yaṭahat pahat kara pālanaya karannā vana allāhṭama ayitiya!” (yayi kiyanu læbē)
